Connection
public class LocalConnection
extends BaseConnection

A connection to invoke services on the Mashup Server in the same JVM as the client application.

Method Detail

invoke

public JUMPResponse invoke(JUMPRequest request)

Invokes a local Mashup Server with a JUMPRequest request. The JUMPRequest can include JUMP headers. See ServiceRequestObject.

Parameters:
request - A JUMPRequest object with the request parameters and headers, plus optional JUMP headers.
Returns:
Returns a JUMPResponse object.

login

public java.lang.String login(java.lang.String userId,
                              java.lang.String password)

Logs a user into the Mashup server using Presto credentials.

Specified by:
login in interface Connection
Overrides:
login in class BaseConnection
Parameters:
userId - The user name or ID.
password - The password.
Returns:
Returns an authentication token string.
